about_the_game:
Demo of the game

Demo Features:
  • You play in the "Sewers" map, modified for the demo, with stronger monsters and more bosses
  • You have 4 missions that become more difficult
  • You can have fun completing the 4 missions and leveling up
  • There is a merchant where you can purchase items with money got from monsters
  • Compatibility with a ps4 pad (set steam input forced off for this game)
